author: Maggie Pehanick
title: TV Scorecard: What Shows Have Been Canceled or Renewed in 2017?
text:
What TV Shows Have Been Canceled or Renewed in 2017? TV Scorecard: What Shows Have Been Canceled or Renewed in 2017? January 8, 2017 by Maggie Pehanick 48 Shares 
It has begun! The exciting, sometimes heartbreaking time of the year when TV shows are either given the green light for a new season, or axed forever â€” until the reboot eventually gets underway in 2036. The CW announced a bushel of renewals in January, including a 13th season of Supernatural , plus new seasons for all its superhero shows. Take a look to see what fates have been decided, and if the show you're looking for isn't on this list yet, check our 2016 scorecard . What's Been Renewed
